summary: During WW2, industrialist Joe Keller commits a crime and frames his business partner Herbert Deever but years later his sin comes back to haunt him when Joe's son plans to marry Deever's daughter.
cast: Edward G. Robinson|Burt Lancaster|Mady Christians|Louisa Horton|Howard Duff|Frank Conroy|Lloyd Gough|Arlene Francis|Harry Morgan|Elisabeth Fraser|Margaret Bert|Walter Bonn|Helen Brown|Pat Flaherty|Jack Gargan|Harry Harvey|Jerry Hausner|Herbert Heywood|William Johnstone|Joe Kerr|Frank Kreig|Richard LaMarr|Peggy Leon|Therese Lyon|Charles Meredith|Howard M. Mitchell|Al Murphy|Bob Perry|William Ruhl|George Slocum|Walter Soderling|George Sorel|Herb Vigran|Victor Zimmerman
keywords: deception|partner|self made man|world war two|war widow
title: Todos eran mis hijos
